title: IS_PED_IN_SPHERE_AREA_OF_ANY_ENEMY_PEDS

0x082D79E15302F0C2// IsPedInSphereAreaOfAnyEnemyPeds
BOOL IS_PED_IN_SPHERE_AREA_OF_ANY_ENEMY_PEDS(Ped ped, float x, float y, float z, float range);Parameters:ped: The ped to check.x: X coordinatey: Y coordinatez: Z coordinaterange: Radius of sphere.Returns: Returns true if ped is within range of any enemies, false otherwise.NativeDB Introduced: v3407
